scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix user-service" "npm start --prefix billing-service" "npm start --prefix appointment-service" "npm start --prefix gateway"
scripts.setup:user: cd user-service && npm install && npm run dbpull:all && npm run migrate:all && npm run generate:all && npm run build
scripts.setup:billing: cd billing-service && npm install && npm run dbpull:all && npm run migrate:all && npm run generate:all && npm run build
scripts.setup:appointment: cd appointment-service && npm install && npm run dbpull:all && npm run migrate:all && npm run generate:all && npm run build
scripts.setup:gateway: cd gateway && npm install && npm run build
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:user && npm run setup:billing && npm run setup:appointment && npm run setup:gateway
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:user && npm run generate:billing && npm run generate:appointment
